subject: Re: Short HOWTO on using git for Samba development
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

James Peach wrote:

> Jerry, can you give a quick summary of why you chose 
> the particular branch structure in  this tree? For example,
> why is "master" unpopulated?

Strictly political.  Since we have two essentially
different trees (v3-0 and v4-0) and no trunk, I choose
to leave master empty (probably should delete it) so
as to avoid giving the appearance of claiming one branch
to have more importance over the other.





cheers, jerry
=====================================================================
Samba                                    ------- http://www.samba.org
Centeris                         -----------  http://www.centeris.com
"What man is a man who does not make the world better?"      --Balian
